The Christmas Dress Snowflake is an absolute stunner that brought a touch of magic to our holiday celebrations!  This dress is not just an outfit; it's a statement of festive elegance. The snowflake design is beautifully embroidered, adding a whimsical charm that captures the spirit of the season. The attention to detail is evident in every stitch, and the quality of the fabric is exceptional.  My little one looked like a winter wonderland princess in this dress! The twirl-worthy skirt added a playful element, making it perfect for holiday photos and family gatherings. The fit was just right, and the zipper closure made dressing up a breeze.  What impressed me most was the durability of the dress. Despite the intricate detailing, it held up well through holiday festivities and multiple washes.  If you're searching for a Christmas dress that combines style, quality, and that special festive touch, the Christmas Dress Snowflake is a delightful choice. It made our holiday celebrations even more memorable! 🎄❄️👗 #ChristmasDress #SnowflakeElegance #FestiveFashion

评论概述: Beautiful dress but fell apart after 1st wash
评论详情: This dress is absolutely stunning and was exactly what I was looking for for our Christmas pictures, however, upon washing it for the 1st time the bow on the front of the dress just completely fell apart. It come completely unattached from the ribbon at the waist and separated into 2 pieces. Unfortunately, I ordered this dress months before the holiday season in preparation for our family pictures and now I can't even return it or have it replaced. If you order this dress, please wash it when you get it so you can make sure yours doesn't fall apart too.
